text: Kurume is a city in Fukuoka Prefecture, northern Kyūshū, Japan. It has been recognized as a core city since 2008.Hoshiko M. et al. "Assessing the validity of health impact assessment predictions regarding a Japanese city's transition to core city status: a monitoring review," Public Health 2012 Feb ; Vol. 126, No. 2, pp. 168-176; retrieved 2012-12-2. ==History== Koura taisha is a notable place. Kurume is known for pork soup or ramen. ==People from Kurume== * Shigeru Aoki-artist (born 1882, died 1911) * Fumiya Fiji-singer * Hanjiro Sakamoto-artist ==References== Category:Cities in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Kurume
